about_the_game:
Re: Spin. Die. Repeat. is a slot machine-inspired roguelike deckbuilder where you create powerful synergies to craft unique builds. Unlock and add hundreds of unique symbols, items, characters, and create your own isekai world with your spins. Immerse into a classic fantasy adventure or be reborn into a random isekai world—no matter what, it will be a game of chance and skill.

You are creating the world you reborn into and shaping its destiny with your spins and decisions. Collect symbols, artifacts, and allies to forge a unique builds and playstyles to discover new solutions for game challenges. Level up, unlock skills, and customize your class to gain control over the divine slot machine of the worlds.

  • 200+ Symbols – Add new symbols to combine their powers into mighty synergies and build unique slot machine strategies with an extensive array of symbols.

  • 100+ Items & Artifacts – Collect rare and exotic items from space and time-traveling vendors and alter the way slots and symbols interact.

  • 50+ Followers – Recruit companions who can aid or hinder your journey.

Choose Your Class & Develop Skills – Shape your world through strategic decisions and progression.
Step into an isekai world brimming with irony, sarcasm, and unexpected twists. Encounter eccentric characters, face off against over-the-top antagonists, and dive into a story where every quest is a mix of classic fantasy tropes and satirical humor. Whether you are unraveling a hero’s prophecy or defying cosmic forces, your choices shape the absurd and ever-changing world around you.

  • Dynamic Storytelling – Take on quests that parody classic fantasy narratives while challenging you to either save or utterly derail entire worlds.

  • Interactive Exploration – Journey through bizarre and unpredictable realms filled with hidden secrets, quirky NPCs, and absurd encounters.

  • Engaging Dialogues – Engage in witty and unexpected conversations, where every interaction can lead to hilarious outcomes or deep world-changing consequences.

Embrace the chaos of a roguelike experience where every playthrough generates a new world with unpredictable twists. Procedural generation fuels every aspect of the game, from stories and symbols to quests, locations, and enemies. Compete against the cruel randomness of fate, forcing you to engage in the most absurd, unexpected, and often hilarious combinations of isekai tropes. Adapt, experiment, and overcome the madness of endless possibilities.

  • Procedurally Generated Storylines – No two runs are the same, as world narratives shift and evolve with each rebirth.

  • Ever-Changing Symbols & Synergies – Discover and adapt to new symbol combinations on every playthrough.

  • Unpredictable Quests & Challenges – Engage in bizarre and unique missions that turn traditional fantasy on its head.

  • Diverse and Eccentric Enemies – Face strange and ridiculous foes that embody the chaotic nature of the isekai genre.

  • Expanding Meta-Progression – Unlock new game content, story arcs, and deck-building possibilities as you progress.

  • 1 Billion+ Random Levels – Explore limitless world variations that ensure no two adventures are alike.

  • 500+ Achievements – Push your skills to the limit by conquering challenges across countless runs.

Spin your way through fate, forge your destiny, and break the cycle in Re: Spin. Die. Repeat.

content_descriptors.notes: Some characters wear revealing outfits, and the game contains scenes of alcohol consumption.

short_description: Re: Spin. Die. Repeat. is a deckbuilding roguelike that combines slot machine mechanics with a fantasy isekai setting. Reborn into a fantasy world, build and customize your slot machine to develop powerful synergies and become the Lord of the realm, or die in vain to be reborn again.
